scripts.dev: export $(cat .env.development | xargs) &&  prisma generate && tsc-watch --outDir dist --onSuccess "node ./dist/index.js"
scripts.build:prod: export $(cat .env.production | xargs) &&  prisma generate && tsc --outDir dist
scripts.migrate:dev: export $(cat .env.development | xargs) &&  prisma migrate dev &&  prisma generate
scripts.migrate:prod: export $(cat .env.production | xargs) &&  prisma migrate deploy &&  prisma generate
